name: Mindella Effect
description:
David Arthur Morgan finds himself placed into a mental "facility" in Bhutan after being diagnosed with severe schizophrenia. His mind will change reality as he goes through his journey towards escape... Or will he?

You won't find out in this version , this is pretty much a demo-showcase of the way the game works

CONTROLS: 

- Arrow keys to move David (player)

- Left click on characters to interact, and click spacebar to continue dialogue
